snippet: John W. Henry wrote an open letter to fans that asked for their patience after Sunday’s home loss to Arsenal condemned the soccer club to its worst start to a league season in 50 years.
lead_paragraph: John W. Henry wrote an open letter to fans that asked for their patience after Sunday’s home loss to Arsenal condemned the soccer club to its worst start to a league season in 50 years.

headline.seo: Owner of Liverpool Seeks Patience of Fans After Loss
